info.sourceTextContent: Ramona, hija del prestamista usurero don Felipe, que ha llegado a ser muy rico, se educa en un excelente y aristocr치tico colegio de se침oritas, donde, sobre su buen fondo natural, pone la educaci칩n los m치s delicados sentimientos.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Ramona is the daughter of a wealthy loan shark. Due to her father's reputation, she is able to attend an elite, aristocratic girl's school.
